name: Nude Female Portrait / Cropped Torso LoRA
description:
This is my Nude Female Portrait / Cropped Torso LoRA. This LoRA is trained on NovelAI, so it will not do particularly well with realistic models. It was also trained with a heavily NSFW dataset.

The strength is good from 0.6 to 0.8, but I use 0.75 strength. All images are generated are generated with Hires Fix and the Orangemix VAE. All pictures were made with the blends available on my profile.

The keyword to this LoRA is 'cropped torso'. Tags like 'simple background', 'white background', and 'upper body' also help.

I also have a Discord. Join if you wanna share results, get advice, or make requests.
